snippet: Two men who are part of a large extended family of gay and lesbian co-parents get married just as their two sons leave the nest.
abstract: Two men who are part of a large extended family of gay and lesbian co-parents get married just as their two sons leave the nest.

headline.main: 'They Were Called the Sperm and Egg Mixers'
